import React from"react";import{ScatterChart,Scatter,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from"recharts";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EfficiencyScatter=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;if(!data||data.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No data available for Efficiency Analysis."});}// Extract time-on-task vs. pass rate data
const scatterData=data.map(row=>({time:parseFloat(row["Average Lesson Time-on-Task per Student (Mins)"])||0,passRate:parseFloat(row["Average % Lessons Passed (YTD)"])||0}));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Efficiency Analysis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{width:"100%",height:400,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ScatterChart,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{type:"number",dataKey:"time",name:"Time on Task (mins)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{type:"number",dataKey:"passRate",name:"Pass Rate (%)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{cursor:{strokeDasharray:"3 3"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Scatter,{data:scatterData,fill:"#8884d8"})]})})]});};export default EfficiencyScatter;
